titles.title: Recognizing the commencement of the 9th year of Operation Enduring Freedom and the sacrifice and contributions of United States service members and their families in support of Operation Enduring Freedom.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 10/6/2009--Introduced. Recognizes the commencement of the 9th year of Operation Enduring Freedom. Recognizes the sacrifice and contributions of U.S. servicemembers and their families in support of such Operation.
